text: To be very clear, we do not support a single additional barrel of output, a single addition well, or off-shore exploration. No fracking. A rapid transition off fossil fuels. Please join us! #GPChttps://twitter.com/ElizabethMay/status/1131330491456475136 …

The women & men of @CoastGuardCAN keep our waters safe and deserve the support they need to do this important work. We’re investing to renew the fleet & build up to 18 new ships to help protect our coasts & create good jobs for Canadians. More: http://ow.ly/Kmzg50un2Yc pic.twitter.com/sZRHpfR86r

There are too many Canadians forced to choose between paying rent & affording their medication. We know that patchwork solutions won't cut it. Our plan for universal #pharmacare for all will put people first, cover everyone & save families money.https://www.cbc.ca/news/health/health-minister-pharmacare-forum-criticism-1.5141295 …

Trop de gens au pays doivent choisir entre payer leur loyer ou s’acheter leurs médicaments. Les demi-mesures ne résoudront pas le problème. Notre plan pour une assurance-maladie universelle fera passer la santé des gens avant les profits des entreprises : https://www.cbc.ca/news/health/health-minister-pharmacare-forum-criticism-1.5141295 …

Absolutely INCORRECT. The HuffPost pulled their misleading headline. My response was to sketch out constitutional norms in a minority parliament. Greens have zero tolerance for Liberal climate failure. #GPChttps://twitter.com/CharlesBurns11/status/1131022169708744704 …

This is the reality of climate change & our future – our communities are just not built to properly manage the changing & extreme weather we're already seeing. We need to build the economy & infrastructure of tomorrow while dramatically reducing emissions.http://projects.thestar.com/climate-change-canada/toronto-flooding …

La vérité sur les changements climatiques : nos collectivités n'ont pas été conçues pour résister aux nouveaux événements météorologiques extrêmes. Nous devons mettre en place des infrastructures adaptées tout en réduisant drastiquement nos émissions : http://projects.thestar.com/climate-change-canada/toronto-flooding …

Human trafficking is a despicable crime that preys on innocent lives. Today, I am announcing that, as Prime Minister, I will make changes to the justice system that put survivors first and keep human traffickers off our streets. WATCH:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6oiwrpTK2Q …

La traite de personnes est un crime ignoble qui prend des vies innocentes. Comme premier ministre, je changerai notre système de justice pour que les survivants soient traités en priorité et pour que les trafiquants demeurent loin de nos rues. REGARDEZ: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w6oiwrpTK2Q …

Today, we announce Kenneth G. Nielsen as an Associate Chief Justice of the Court of Queen’s Bench of Alberta. His extensive experience in practising & teaching law, and as a judge will serve him well as he continues to serve Albertans in this new role.https://pm.gc.ca/eng/news/2019/05/22/prime-minister-announces-appointment-new-associate-chief-justice-court-queens-bench …

Nous annonçons que Kenneth G. Nielsen occupera le poste de juge en chef adjoint de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de l'Alberta. Sa vaste expérience d’avocat, d’enseignant en droit et de juge lui sera utile dans ce nouveau rôle au service des Albertains.https://pm.gc.ca/fra/nouvelles/2019/05/22/premier-ministre-annonce-la-nomination-du-nouveau-juge-chef-adjoint-la-cour-du …
